resources.string:
Hi, my name is Sean. 

I am the son of former Canadian diplomat(father) and a dentist for the United Nations Economic Commission for Africa(mother). 

I live for my partner, and my daughter. 
Though, traditionally, I am avid weight lifter and runner, though college has made me incredibly lazy and out of shape. 

This is further compounded by eating enough food to feed a small african tribe. 
I have a real passion for the craft of software and web development, yet question daily if I have the apptitude to succeed in this field. 
However, I am not completely disheartened because I feel I could carve out a roll for myself in the field, yet maybe not as a pure dev. 

I have predisposition of seeing the best in everyone, and am empathetic to a fault. 

I also love curvy women. 
My partner is curvy, and god-damn she is sexy to me.
